contentList.content: Elemental Essence
The gem you found seems to have imbued you with a mysterious power.
Elemental Power
This mysterious gem seems to have infused you with an overwhelming power.
Spark of Mystra
This gen seems to be infused with the power of the weave.
Soul Fragment of Mystra
This gem is overflowing with the power of the weave.
Arcane Essence
Upon touching the gem, your mind is flooded with a plethora of knowledge and spells focused on channeling the Weave itself.
Arcane Power
Upon touching this mysterious, pulsating gem, you feel a sudden clarity, learning a devastating spell.
Spark of the Weave
The gem seems to have also imbued your body with the a small spark of the weave, slightly empowering your spells and defense against them.
Soul of the Weave
The enimatic gem also seems to have imbued your body, dramatically improving your spells and the defense against them.
Grimiore of Mystra
The collection of spells that flooded your mind upon touching the Spark of Mystra.
Siphoning Weave
When one of your Arcane spells lands a killing blow, you restore some spent Elemental Essence.
Arcane Curse

Infect your target with a curse infectinmg their connection to the Weave. This causes harsh reactions when attempting to cast spells, and will eventually leave them unable to access the weave at all. Failure to cure it in time will eventually lead to Weave Rot, which can be fatal.
Cursed Weave Fever
The first stage of Weave Rot, which leaves you vulnerabute to Force damage from magical sources. This curse can be dispelled.
Cursed Weave Anathema
The second stage of Weave Rot, increasing your vulnerability, leaving you vulnerable to all Force damage. This curse can be dispelled.
Cursed Weave Plague
The third stage of Weave Rot, further increasing your vulnerabilities to all magical sources, as well as vulnerability to all Force damage. This curse can be dispelled.
Weave Rot

The final stage of the curse. Your connection to the weave has been completely severed. Your body weak with vulnerabilities to all magic sources and Force damage, you can feel your life force slowly slipping away. This curse cannot be dispelled.
Cursed Weave Side Effect
When attempting to cast spells, the curse worsens and inflicts pain on the caster.
Arcane Barrage
Channel the weave to send a destructive burst towards your target, causing serious damage and temporarily afflicting them with Weave Rot
Surging Weave Rot
The channeled surge leaves a brief after affect on the target, similar to Weave Rot.
Arcane Blast
Channel the Weave into a single point, then unlease a powerful wave of destruction towards everything in front of you.
Arcane Blitz
Empowered by the Weave, you rush your target with blinding speed.
Arcane Arrow
Channel the Weave into your hands to deliver a quick bolt of arcane energy at your target(s).
Arcane Explosion
Blast an area with the raw arcane force of the Weave, crippling the magic use of anyone who gets too close.
Arcane Enchanting
You can utilize the Weave to temporarily enchant your weapons and armor.
Arcane Ambush
Manipulate the Weave to leap into the air, and come crashing down on your target(s) with tremendous impact.
Arcane Onslaught
Instilled with the Weave, charge your target with demolishing force.
Arcane Shift
Saturated in the Weave, teleport yourself across great distances, blasting your targets as you arrive.
Arcane Stealth
With the power of the Weave, slink into the shadows, rendering yourself invisible.
Arcane Stealth Dismiss
Dismiss the arcane power of the weave to reveal yourself from hiding.
Arcane Obscured
Aided by the Weave, you find it easier to remain in the shadows.
Arcane Concealed
While obscured by the Weave, you become imperceptable, near completely invisible.
Arcane Sight
The same power that shields you from detection also grants you an enhanced sight, allowing you to detect the invisible.
Tear of Mystra
Focus your mind, commanding the power of the Goddess of the Weave herself. Call forth an immense comet made up of Pure Weave energy, to wreak utter destruction on your targets.
